attributes.action: Deal with the problem of untaxed and uninsured motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a huge problem in the United Kingdom with untaxed and uninsured motorists.The number of uninsured/untaxed individuals is said to amount to 2,193,000 or one in fifteen of Britains 33 million vehicles.(See report in Sunday Times In Gear dated 4 February 2007, page six.)  
These individuals are not only driving around on our roads illegally but are driving up insurance premiums for all vehicle owners whose vehicles are insured and registered at DVLA.
This band of miscreants are also said to avoid paying speeding and most other motoring related fines.
This totally unsatisfactory situation needs rectifying now and not at the expense of law-abiding motorists

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
